page.title: 18A STOTTESDON MOTHER'S P.M.
page.content: {Clare & I have lunch}(wholemeal cheese sandwiches soup & yogurt), then I put her to bed for a rest.I do some more housework (eg. mopping floors) until she wakes, about 3.00., but if the weather is fine I spend this time in the garden, weeding or cutting the grass with our petrol mower. When Clare wakes I change her nappy, give her a drink & play until 3.30 when {Michael comes home}to a cup of tea & a biscuit. The children play & watch TV until their dinner at 5pm. Their favourite is chips, sausage & beans followed by ice cream. Next I prepare our evening meal,ready for my {husband's arrival}at 7.30, though this time may vary by an hour or more depending on traffic & his workload. I put the children to bed at 8.15 then we talk, watch TV & read before retiring to bed at about 10.15p.m.
